name: AAVEInterestERC20
description: AAVEInterestERC20. This contract contains token-specific logic for investing ERC20 tokens into AAVE protocol.

eventDecorators.name: PaidInterest
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted for each executed trade.

functionDecorators.name: enableInterestToken
functionDecorators.description: Enables support for interest earning through specific aToken.

parameterDecorators.name: _aToken
parameterDecorators.description: address of the aToken contract. Underlying token address is derived from this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _dust
parameterDecorators.description: small amount of underlying tokens that cannot be paid as an interest. Accounts for possible truncation errors.

parameterDecorators.name: _interestReceiver
parameterDecorators.description: address of the interest receiver for underlying token and associated COMP tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _minInterestPaid
parameterDecorators.description: min amount of underlying tokens to be paid as an interest.

functionDecorators.name: forceDisable
functionDecorators.description: Last-resort function for returning assets to the Omnibridge contract in case of some failures in the logic. Disables this contract and transfers locked tokens back to the mediator. Only owner is allowed to call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the invested token contract that should be disabled.

functionDecorators.name: getModuleInterfacesVersion
functionDecorators.description: Tells the module interface version that this contract supports.

functionDecorators.name: interestAmount
functionDecorators.description: Tells the current accumulated interest on the invested tokens, that can be withdrawn and payed to the interest receiver.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the invested token contract.

functionDecorators.name: invest
functionDecorators.description: Invests the given amount of tokens to the AAVE protocol. Only Omnibridge contract is allowed to call this method. Converts _amount of TOKENs into aTOKENs.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the invested token contract.

functionDecorators.name: investedAmount
functionDecorators.description: Tells the current amount of underlying tokens that was invested into the Compound protocol.

functionDecorators.name: isInterestSupported
functionDecorators.description: Tells if interest earning is supported for the specific underlying token contract.

returnDecorators.description: true, if interest earning is supported for the given token.

functionDecorators.name: lendingPool
functionDecorators.description: Tells the address of the LendingPool contract in the Ethereum Mainnet.

functionDecorators.name: payInterest
functionDecorators.description: Pays collected interest for the underlying token. Anyone can call this function. Earned interest is withdrawn and transferred to the specified interest receiver account.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the invested token contract in which interest should be paid.

functionDecorators.name: setInterestReceiver
functionDecorators.description: Updates address of the interest receiver. Can be any address, EOA or contract. Set to 0x00..00 to disable interest transfers. Only owner is allowed to call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the invested token contract.

functionDecorators.name: setMinInterestPaid
functionDecorators.description: Updates min interest amount that can be transferred in single call. Only owner is allowed to call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the invested token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _minInterestPaid
parameterDecorators.description: new amount of TOKENS and can be transferred to the interest receiver in single operation.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Changes the owner of this contract.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws at least the given amount of tokens from the AAVE protocol. Only Omnibridge contract is allowed to call this method. Converts aTOKENs into _amount of TOKENs.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the invested token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: minimal amount of tokens to withdraw.
